titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Linguistics, Yale University, Records
Department of Linguistics, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday November 30, 2018 at 10:01

did.unittitle: Department of Linguistics, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, reports, faculty and student records, alumni files, and a paper by Rulon S. Wells entitled "Linguistics at Yale, 1931-1946."

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 14-B (YRG 14-B), Records of academic departments and programs of the Yale Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access is partially restricted. See inventory for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Linguistics, Yale University, Records (RU 428). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, reports, faculty and student records, alumni files, and a paper by Rulon S. Wells entitled "Linguistics at Yale, 1931-1946."

did.unittitle: "Linguistics at Yale, 1931-1946," by Rulon S. Wells
